history.text: hello, have you seen despicable me yet?
yes, yes I have!

did you know that The film was animated by the French animation studio
Mac Guff, which was later acquired by Illumination Entertainment.
wow, no! I did not know that, fascinating!

Kids will dig it, adults will smile with amusement, and no one will be any different
afterward than they were walking into the theater.
yes, quite, I concur with you good sir.
its the kind of movie you can watch several times a month and still have a good laugh
I cant wait to see the second one!
ohh me too! It looks so good!
I think my kids are getting old enough to sit through a whole movie finally.
you do know that gru is the evil guy right?
right, yes I do. hes very funny. and is horrible at being the bad guy.

here is a classic scene from the movie. Gru seeks a loan from the Bank of Evil. Bank president Mr. Perkins is impressed
by the plan but will provide the money only if Gru can obtain the necessary shrink ray first.
omigoodness every scene in that movie is a great scene!
I agree, thats what makes it so re watchable!
the minions are so cute and funny. I love how they have their different personalities.
Eventually, Gru and the girls arrive at Vector's fortress, and Gru steals the shrink ray.
I am familiar with the movie, what if he was able to dhrink the moon?
ohh goodness, I hope they make many more minions movies. there are so many good ideas I can think of!
that part of what makes minions so great
deep down i think gru has a big heart.
yes. yes he does
in the movie Gru successfully shrinks and steals the Moon,
that is so crazy! What could they think of next to top that idea?

I dont know but then he rushes back to Earth to attend the
recital—only to find a ransom note from Vector, who has kidnapped the girls.
ohhh your story is getting good now

As the Moon starts to expand in Vector's ship, Gru, Dr. Nefario, and the Minions
execute a daring mid-air rescue of the girls just as the Moon explodes out of Vector's ship
and launches itself back into orbit, with Vector trapped on it.
This makes me want to go find that dvd and watch it again.
yeah its been a little while since i have seen it as well .
how many do you think they will make? more minions movies I mean
I do not know but I hope at least a few more
They are good laughs for sure!
Do you agree with the rating of the movie?
but of course! no one should not be able to see this movie.

uid1response.feedback: this was a fun HIT! thank you!
